How to show our love to Ranran in java code12345678910111213public class ILove{ private String name; Ilove(String name) { this.name = name; } public void isLovedBy(String message) { System.out.println("Yes! " + message + "!!"); } public void main() { ILove ranran = new ILove("Ranran"); ranran.isLovedBy("All of US"); }}
